scripts.docker-build-run: docker build -f .docker/Dockerfile -t kmdb . && docker run -p 8080:8080 kmdb
scripts.docker-build-run:arm: docker build -f .docker/Dockerfile.arm -t kmdb . && docker run -p 8080:8080 kmdb
scripts.deploy-local: tsc && vite build && docker build -f .docker/Dockerfile -t kmdb . && docker run -p 8080:8080 kmdb
scripts.deploy-local:arm: tsc && vite build && docker build -f .docker/Dockerfile.arm -t kmdb . && docker run -p 8080:8080 kmdb
